text: Ini adalah ketiga kalinya kami menginap di Batiqa Palembang. Pengalaman sebelumnya baik sehingga kami kembali menginap di sini. Sangat disayangkan kunjungan ketiga kalinya mengecewakan. Dimulai dari kurangnya koordinasi reservasi, dari pas reservasi via wa dijelaskan kamar non smoking dan 2 kamar bersebelahan. Namun pada saat kami check in di tengah malam dari perjalanan luar kota, resepsionis memberikan langsung 2 kamar di smoking area dan tidak bersebelahan. Bisa dibayangkan tengah malam masih harus bolak balik karena salah kamar. Pada hari berikutnya kunci kamar #302 rusak dan tidak bisa dibuka dengan kartu. Harus menunggu ada orang yang membawa kunci manual untuk dibuka sampai lebih dari 1/2 jam menunggu di luar karena tidak bisa masuk. Padahal sudah jadwal kami check out dan janji ke tempat lain. Dan terakhir barang kami berupa charger yang tertinggal di kamar pada saat menginap sebelumnya dan dijanjikan akan disimpan sudah hilang tercecer oleh pihak hotel. Dengan semua kejadian ini kami tidak mendapat bantuan dan permintaan maaf yang proper dari tim resepsionis yang terkesan hanya membantu sekali lewat saja.
title: Pelayanan yang menurun dan barang hilang

text:
Proses check in di Batiqa Hotel Palembang  ini cepat, semua menyambut dengan hangat dan sangat helpful banget. Selain saya pun tidak perlu kerepotan membawa barang-barang karena dengan sigap para karyawan Batiqa langsung memberikan bantuan.

Ada compliment drink yang disesuaikan dengan cuaca seperti teh hingga bandrek. Saat musim hujan seperti saat ini, bandrek sangat cocok sekali.

Batiqa Hotel Palembang memiliki kids corner membuat para keponakan saya bahagia bisa bermain sepuasnya.

Ada makan malam dengan menu Indonesia yakni Soto Ayam dan Rawon di Fresqa Bistro. Suasana yang nyaman, interior artistik yang hangat, serta lantunan musik lembut mengiringi kami makan malam. Disini juga terhadap ruang terbuka yang nyaman.

Sajian buffet breakfast yang sangat enak dan menunya banyak sekali. Makanan jadi salah satu hal penting dalam memilih hotel untuk staycation.

Pengalaman yang menyenangkan menginap di Batiqa Hotel Palembang
title: Staycation Seru di Batiqa Hotel Palembang

text:
Saya sangat menyesal karena harus meninggalkan hotel ini.
Terletak di pusat kota, mau kemana2 ga jauh
Di sekitar hotel banyak jual makanan dan toko ritel(indomaret-alfamart) yg bisa ditempuh hanya dengan jalan kaki.
Dekat dengan mall icon palembang, jalan kaki cuma 5 menit

Kamarnya bersih dan nyaman
Wifi nya kenceng sangat membantu bagi yg dalam perjalanan bisnis
Di sekitar hotel banyak jual makanan

Breakfastnya oke, sangat variatif dan ga membosankan, menu khas palembang yang selalu ada setiap hari semua makanan rasanya enak,
Terutama ayam kecapnya...feels like home
Sedikit kesulitan kalo mo nyari tissue di resto
Tempat garam yg susah keluar jadi kadang harus buka tutup bawahnya

Staff :
Door man yg selalu tersenyum.
Reception yg sagat membantu dan informatif.
Staff restoran yang very helpfully, 
Cleaning service, thx pak Harri very fast respond

Thanks juga buat the special person Mba Marlina dan Mba Rani sudah jadi teman ngobrol selama tinggal disini, dan selalu sabar ngladenin kita...thats good

Novi, boby and all staff you are nice people...glad to meet you all

Over all...this is nice hotel for bussines or family to stay

Will be back soon

text:
Ketika saya mencoba untuk mencari sebuah pilihan baru hotel di palembang. Saya menemukan hotel ini. Teman saya berkata bahwa hotel ini baru saja dibuka beberapa bulan lalu.

Saya tidak pernah tinggal di hotel ini sebelumnya, tapi hal pertama yang membuat saya tinggal adalah harga masih yang wajar untuk sekelas bintang 3. Untuk hotel bintang 3, itu sangat baik.

Ketika saya memasuki lobi, staf hangat menyapa, staf resepsionis ramah dan baik, walaupun agak lama pelayanan di meja resepsionis karena masih baru buka pikir saya.

Saya mendapatkan kamar di lantai 9, koridor cukup besar karena sudah dilengkapi dengan ac.
Ruangan ini tidak begitu kecil, cukuplah untuk ditempati 2 orang. wifi tidak begitu cepat (200kbps katanya). Pilihan saluran tv cukup banyak.

Sarapan banyak variasinya, pilihan makanan indonesia atau continental. Beberapa salad bar, salad bar itu terburuk yang pernah saya lihat.

Dan 1 lagi, ketika saya kembali ke kamar saya staf hotel telah membersihkan kamar ini. saya melihat ada hanya 1 handuk yang tersisa di kamar saya, ketika saya meminta ke staf resepsionis untuk memberikan 1 lagi, mereka seakan enggan memberikan memberikan handuknya. 

Llokasi hotel ini strategis, hanya beberapa kilometer dari palembang icon mall di depan hotel, ada banyak makanan jalanan.
Pasti akan datang kembali jika saya mengunjungi palembang lagi.
title: Hotel dilokasi strategis dengan layanan bersahabat

text:
Ini pertama kalinya saya menginap di BATIQA Hotel Palembang, walaupun sebelumnya sy juga pernah mencoba hotel Batiqa tp di Cirebon.
Berdasar pengalaman di Cirebon maka sy memutuskan utk memilih Batiqa Hotel ketika di Palembang
Kamar wakaupun agak sempit tp sangat nyaman, apalagi ada satu sofa/kursi di sisi jendela kamar (Kmr.710) sehingga bisa santai sambil melihat suasana kota Palembang.
Kamar mandinya bersih sekali, AC sangat dingin.
Menu Sarapan byk pilihan dan rasanya cukup enak. 
Secara keseluruhan sy puas di hotel ini.

text:
ini kali kedua saya menginap di Hotel ini dan menginap 2 malam, tetap baik pelayanan nya.
1. Lokasi Hotel strategis dekat dekat Mal Palembang Icon, mau oleh-oleh pempek juga dekat (pempek candy) tinggal jalan kaki. Depan Hotel banyak sekali Warung Makan yg enak dan murah, dan juga ada minimarket (alfa+indo)

4. Sarapan enak, menu nya lumayan banyak dan ada menu lokal+ tradisional
5. Pesan Makanan Room Service juga cepat, murah dan enak
Kalau ke Palembang pasti ke Hotel ini lagi

text:
Sebenarnya dari lokasi, hotel ini sangat bagus. Karena berada di pusat kota yang tidak terlalu ramai dan macet. Disekitar hotel pun sangat banyak tempat makan sehingga tamu dari hotel akan dimudahkan. Ukuran kamar pun cukup lega untuk berdua.

Wastafel agak mengeluarkan bau kalau pertama kali kena siram air. Jadi saya harus membiarkan air kran terbuka dulu mengguyur wastafel baru bisa melakukan kegiatan di area tersebut.
Mungkim sebaiknya dilakukan perbaikan untuk kekurangan tersebut agar tamu akan menjadi lebih betah lagi.

text: I stayed 2 nights at this hotel in my recent business trip. My first impression this hotel has a very unique design with batik motif at its ceiling. Lobby is very homey with a clean yet modern design. My room was at the 5th floor with a city view. I can see a little bit sight of Ampera Bridge from my room. The room is clean enough, not really spacious, but still feels comfortable and equipped with everything you need. I'm in love with sofa bed near the window, my favorite place to lay down after a busy day. Breakfast is so good,They even providing jamu, a javanese traditional drink at their breakfast buffet. Location is perfect, near shopping mall, family mart, and empek empek candy which is quite famous in Palembang. This hotel is highly recommended if you want something modern with a touch of tradition in the heart of palembang.
title: Simple, Clean, Comfortable

text:
I booked Batiqa Hotel Palembang special for my mom birthday. I wasn't expecting much for this class of hotel. But I got back then was very good overall. Although the room was a bit small with also small size of beds, but it was good after all. Unfortunately the thing really annoying me was the fridge was not cool at all. I don't know whether the fridge in my room was broken or else. Anyway, I stayed at room 1022. One really amazing of this hotel was the location and the internet connection. This hotel was very close to some shopping centre in Palembang. And if we stayed there at weekend, we could just walk to Kambang Iwak Park to do jogging, eating some street foods, or doing gymnastic there. I never experience this speed of internet connection on few hotels I've ever stayed before. But Batiqa Hotel Palembang knows how to entertain people. I even watched movie at night by streaming through my laptop using the internet there and there was no buffer at all. 
I do recommend this hotel to everybody seeks comfortably, fun, and with very strategic location. For business trip, family, weekend, backpacker, etc.
title: Surprise for my mom

text:
I stayed in Batiqa Hotel for 3 days and 2 night for a family event. I have an overall pleasant experience staying in Batiqa. The staffs were helpful, the room was clean and nice, and the hotel location is close to Palembang's malls and restaurants. However, I have a few suggestion that might improve customer experience in Batiqa:

1. The internet worked well for chatting and mobile phone. But it did not work at all at my laptop thus I couldn't work inside the hotel room. This is rather annoying.
2. There was no shower cap provided in the bathroom.
3. The safe inside each room was locked with someone else's password. Would be nice if the password was reset every time new customer stays.
4. The cooling fridge inside the hotel room is not cool at all. No functionality whatsoever to keep food/drinks chilled.
title: Overall Good Experience, Except for the Internet

text:
I had business trip in Palembang couple weeks ago and stayed at Batiqa for 11 nights. Here are some points noted during my stay:
+ Strategic location
There are a lot of restaurants near the hotel, such as padang restaurant and pempek candy beside the hotel, small pujasera selling Chinese food, soto, padang, penyetan and so on at the opposite, sushi tei which is located only around 350m from hotel and Palembang Icon Mall which is less than 1 km.
+ Friendly staffs.
+ Comfy, clean and tidy room.
+ Everything needed is on its place
Wardrobe, beds, couch near window, working desk, cable tv, drawer, bedside table beside each bed, cooler, electric kettle, a lot of electric plugs.
+ Parquet floor
I don’t really like carpet because sometimes old carpet looks nasty and smelly.
+ Quite bright lighting (for those who have to work at hotel, like me, it’s a plus).

- Size of the bed is quite small for twin share (superior room).
- The bathroom sometimes smells not good. I guess it comes from the drain.
- Maybe you should bring your own hairdryer (especially for ladies).
It does provide hairdryer but only upon request and should be requested over and over again.
- Quite slow internet connection (wi-fi).
title: Value for Money

text:
Batiqa Hotel Palembang is a 3-star hotel with 5-star service and experience. I'm running a project in Palembang & I travel there 2-3 times a month.  After I stayed in this hotel during my 3rd visit to Palembang, I have decided that this is the property I'd always want to stay in during my business trip in Palembang.
Rooms are clean & comfy. Room rates are very competitive.  The ambiance is comforting & homey. Very friendly & attentive staff.  Maybe because I stay there all the time.  Breakfast is included & it has pretty good selections of food.  Enough to get you going in the morning.  Location is key if you're looking for convenience.  10-15 min. walk from Palembang Icon.  Plenty of food outlets nearby & around the hotel.
Rani, the F&B Manager is above & beyond awesome.  Very attentive & helpful.
That's why Batiqa Hotel Palembang is my home away from home.
title: A Home Away from Home

text:
I arrived on 8 March 2016, a day before the full solar eclipse was to be experienced in Palembang. I was cheerfully welcomed by the doorman and receptionists upon my arrival. Checking in was efficiently done and alternative sites from where to view the next morning's eclipse were clearly described. The hotel was preparing their own rooftop for guests to have a view of the eclipse from 11 floors above ground and although it was not yet open to guests, upon my request, one of the staff readily and promptly escorted me to check it out. The hotel had placed adequate concern for the safety of guests by laying out a properly cordoned safe passage past the equipment that are typically installed on the roof of a multi-storey building, to the side facing the next-day's eclipse. It certainly provided an excellent vantage view, although I subsequently decided to join the massive crowd at the riverside on the next morning.

My room was adequately spacious, clean and comfortable. However, I was surprised that the room safe, placed inside the wardrobe, was not secured to anything. It was small enough and not unduly heavy for me to lift, place in my suitcase and steal the safe! I attributed it to the hotel being still new and that perhaps this had missed inspection before the hotel opened. As I wanted to use the safe, I reported it to guest services and was delighted that within minutes someone came with the necessary tools and rectified this.

Breakfast was an ample buffet spread of variety with international and local choices. The cafe layout on the first floor was well thought out, with seating available within the air-conditioned enclosed area as well as outside on the balcony, which was my preference, overlooking the streets below. I didn't mind that, at the time I was breakfasting, they didn't have someone walk around to pour us tea or coffee into the cups that had been placed on our tables. I prefer to get my own coffee, rather than have one poured early and become cold by the time I was ready to drink it. But, as per the feedback I immediately gave to the cafe staff, the spare coffee cups and saucers should have been placed where the tea/coffee pots were, rather than at the diagonally opposite corner of the room.

All staff I met were cheerful, well-groomed, polite, friendly and genuinely put in efforts to assist with any assistance I needed, though I wished that some would have had better ability to speak English.

I was very pleased to discover that the hotel had an arrangement with a supplier of one local delicacy that I liked (and that I wanted to bring some home to share), where the hotel would assist guests to place an order for the items to be packed and delivered to the guests at the hotel. I used this service to get a package prepared and delivered to me on my final night of packing to go home.

I found the hotel to be overall very good. Shortcomings I found were all forgivable, especially because the staff obligingly put in efforts to rectify any that are conveyed to them.
title: Overall very good

text:
When i try to looking a new selection of hotel in palembang , i found this hotel , my colleague said that this hotel just opened for 1 months ... 

I never stayed on this hotel franchise before , but the first thing that made me stay is the price is still on promo rate (its just 340k++). For 3 stars hotel , its so OK.

When i entered the lobby , the staff is warmly greets me , the front office staff is Ok from appearance but some of them still looks so stiff ... maybe because of less experience . And the booking is fast.

I get room at 9th floor , the corridor is great because its equipped with AC .
The room is not so small, its ok for solo traveller like me . WiFi not so fast (200kbps only). Selection of TV channel is quite a lot . The things that really great is the amenities , i really like the package ...

The breakfast is ok, selection of indonesian or western style . Please improve the salad bar, its the worst salad bar i ever seen .

Great service include they give me a free service for scanning documents.

And 1 more , when i back to my room after my room is cleaned , i see there just 1 towel left in my room , when i ask the front office to give 1 more , they just like suspicious . Please improve the room cleaning service.

And the location of this hotel is reallt strategic , just a kilo away from Palembang Icon Mall and in front of the hotel there's so much street food .

Will definitely come back if i visit palembang again ...

Please , build a swimming pool ... haha :p
title: Strategic business hotell with great service

text:
My first visit to this Hotel was in 2018 and ever since then i always visit this Hotel every year as my In-Law's house is reachable by walk.

I always love this hotel since it's clean, cozy and simple. The room is good.

However i have some minor complaints for this hotels
1. The floor inside the room sometimes not properly swept or cleaned. Sometimes i can see some hairs from previous guest and also some of the dirt in the floor.

2. If you got room faced to the main street, you will hear noises coming from the street mostly coming from motorcycles and this will last until 11 to 12 PM every night.
So ensure that you have either high floor or not street-facing room.

Breakfast is decent but they have indomie!

Room is worth the price.

Will always go back here as long as they keep their cleanliness.
title: Nice Budget Hotel in the Middle of Palembang

text: This three-star hotel is strategically located in the middle of town, easy to find and visible from afar because of its large blue signage. The hotel is equipped with a security guarded parking lot, in the lobby there is a lounge to wait while reading magazines or newspapers, there are kids area, there is a gym and an outside area for smoking or small events. Friendly and warm staff. 2nd floor is a restaurant and meeting rooms, also provided outside dining area to enjoy the outside air. For the rooms part is very neat, comfortable and quiet. Guest amenities are sufficient and provided tea or coffee to be brewed themselves along with 2 bottled mineral water. There is 1 safe and 1 small fridge provided. here can also order "Pempek Candy" which is located not far from the hotel. To the left of the hotel there is also the food of the paddock, and on the right there is "Pempek Nony". Close to the mall and close to Sushi Tei. Please enjoy the warmth and hospitality here.
title: Warmth, Good, and Strategic Hotel in This Town

text: This is my second trip using this hotel. Very clean and nice interior. Staff is friendly during my stay. Room space is decent not too small or big. Also near one of the Mall is this hotel advantage. And really value for money. A very good three stars hotel.
title: Clean and Value for Money

text:
This is my first time staying at this hotel in Palembang. It has a beautiful wood flooring. The room is comfy and the rate is reasonable. About IDR 500,000 (38 USD).

The staffs are nice but their works are really slow. I must wait more than half an hour to get my room ready. I already book the room since a week ago.

The hotel is located in the middle of the city. There is a padang restaurant. The foods are delicious and you only have to pay IDR 30,000 (2.5 USD).

So despite of the staffs performance, i might stay here again when i came to palembang again
title: Comfy

text:
With the rate I paid, I am very satisfied with the hotel overall services. 
Some minor improvement which will improve guest comfort are :
1. higher water pressure (for shower and water closet washer)
2. Light control switch should be located closer to the bed head.
3. Provide somekind of drug store to provide personal care items (bar soap, toothpaste, headache medicine etc), or provide umbrella for guest use to buy those items at nearby shop but protected from the rain or sun.
